title: Gangplank Splash Art
body: Why is it that Spooky Gangplank, Minuteman Gangplank and Sailor Gangplank have not received a better splash art? I think sailor gangplank's splash art is the worst, since it doesn't even looks like the champions skin, coupled with spooky GP.

replies.body: He's on their list, it's just they have quite a few champions to go through and update still.  They were on Miss Fortune currently, but last we heard she was on hold due to being down an artist so we just have to wait a bit and see where that goes.

Spooky Gangplank reminds me of the Pre-2015 VGU Gangplank & Minute Man looks cool if you ask me (Could look even better with how Artwork is being handled now adays).
As for Sailor? You got me, looks nothing like his in-game model. That one has the potential to be one of his better splashes when they update it since he kinda has a Navy-Theme going on.

> [{quoted}](name=EclipsedFerret,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=j1BOEpzO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-12-13T18:43:07.216+0000)
>
> Spooky Gangplank reminds me of the Pre-2015 VGU Gangplank & Minute Man looks cool if you ask me (Could look even better with how Artwork is being handled now adays).
> As for Sailor? You got me, looks nothing like his in-game model. That one has the potential to be one of his better splashes when they update it since he kinda has a Navy-Theme going on.

The problem with minuteman splash is his sword is literally in it's sheath as he holds it aggressively, lol.

> [{quoted}](name=EclipsedFerret,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=j1BOEpzO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-12-13T18:43:07.216+0000)
>
> Spooky Gangplank reminds me of the Pre-2015 VGU Gangplank & Minute Man looks cool if you ask me (Could look even better with how Artwork is being handled now adays).
> As for Sailor? You got me, looks nothing like his in-game model. That one has the potential to be one of his better splashes when they update it since he kinda has a Navy-Theme going on.

The current Spooky GP art is the Chinese art for the original/pre-rework GP, so ofc he looks like the pre-rework GP in the splash.

Sailor GP's splash art is just old. It's also for the original GP.
Personally i love the spooky gp splash art but that’s just me
Honestly, I never use any of those skins. I only use dreadnova or captain. While I don't use the old skins I do agree they need some form of update

Yeah i got Sailor Gangplank, never been so dissapointed in a skin. The picture is a fun sailor, ingame it's some baldass buff angry lookin guy, did i mention he's fucking BALD. Look at the splash that beautifull hair, i wanted that not some angry bald man.
